description: Enable integration of WezTerm terminal emulator with external tools and resources through the Model Context Protocol. Enhance your terminal experience by allowing dynamic access to data and actions via MCP. Simplify automation and context-aware workflows within WezTerm.

capabilities.name: write_to_terminal
capabilities.description: Writes text to the active WezTerm pane - often used to run commands

capabilities.name: read_terminal_output
capabilities.description: Reads output from the active WezTerm pane

capabilities.name: send_control_character
capabilities.description: Sends control characters to the active WezTerm pane

capabilities.name: list_panes
capabilities.description: Lists all panes in the current WezTerm window

capabilities.name: switch_pane
capabilities.description: Switches to a specific pane in WezTerm

capabilities.name: write_to_specific_pane
capabilities.description: Writes text to a specific WezTerm pane by pane ID
